room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: This was the best escape rooms I've ever done! We did deep space and it was amazing family fun.

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: My wife and I did the Deep Space room and had a blast!! We really enjoyed the room detail and puzzle challenges.  Staff was very professional and friendly. We will be coming back to tackle their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Deep Space" by Codescape in Charlotte
review: Four of us completed the Deep Space challenge with 13 minutes remaining. This was my first time doing an escape room and was a blast. I look forward to doing more in the future! The staff was very friendly and even showed us the first room of other challenges since we were the last there in the evening. Keep the new rooms coming. We will definitely be back to Codescape!!! Ka
